resources.string: Secure connection. Your information (for example, passwords or credit card numbers) is private when it is sent to this site.
Your connection to this site is not private. You should not enter any sensitive information on this site (for example, passwords or credit cards), because it could be stolen by attackers.

WHAT DO WE DO WITH YOUR INFORMATION?

Nothing!

Your data is your data. We Do not. Will not and have never collected your data.
